component.description: PickList is used for transferring data between two different collections.
component.attributes:
&input_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
var false java.lang.String Name of the iterator.
itemLabel false java.lang.String Label of an item.
itemValue false java.lang.Object Value of an item.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container.
disabled false java.lang.Boolean false Disables the component.
effect false java.lang.String fade Name of the animation to display. Default is fade.
effectSpeed false java.lang.String fast Speed of the animation. Default is fast.
addLabel false java.lang.String Add Text of add button. Default is "Add".
addAllLabel false java.lang.String Add All Text of add all button. Default is "Add All".
removeLabel false java.lang.String Remove Text of remove button. Default is "Remove".
removeAllLabel false java.lang.String Remove All Text of remove all button. Default is "Remove All".
moveUpLabel false java.lang.String Move Up Text of move up button. Default is "Move Up".
moveTopLabel false java.lang.String Move Top Text of move top button. Default is "Move Top".
moveDownLabel false java.lang.String Move Down Text of move down button. Default is "Move Down".
moveBottomLabel false java.lang.String Move Bottom Text of move bottom button. Default is "Move Down".
showSourceControls false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies visibility of reorder buttons of sourcelist. Default is false.
showTargetControls false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies visibility of reorder buttons of target list. Default is false.
onTransfer false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when an item is transferred from one list to another.
label false java.lang.String A localized user presentable name.
itemDisabled false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies if an item can be picked or not.
showSourceFilter false java.lang.Boolean false Displays an input filter for source list.
showTargetFilter false java.lang.Boolean false Displays an input filter for target list.
filterMatchMode false java.lang.String Match mode for filtering, valid values are startsWith (default), contains, endsWith and custom.
filterFunction false java.lang.String Client side function to use in custom filterMatchMode.
